node.title: Who Accepts BitTorrent Token (BTT) as Payment?
node.content:
The BitTorrent Token (BTT) was created and issued by the BitTorrent Foundation in 2019. Since BTT was introduced to the BitTorrent ecosystem, millions of users have set up digital wallets inside BitTorrent/µTorrent torrent clients to take advantage of speedier downloads. If you are a BitTorrent user that has accumulated a BTT balance and are looking for companies that accept BTT in the form of payment, we have created a helpful resource below.

Check back here often as we will update this article as we discover more companies that accept BTT. If you are a merchant that accepts BTT and don’t see your company below, email us to let us know. 

Disclaimer: The contents of this blog are for informational purposes only. Rainberry, Inc. (BitTorrent) makes no representations, warranties, or recommendations regarding the independent vendors, products, services or urls referenced herein. As always, readers should conduct their own research and due diligence before engaging with a third party platform. 

1. Payment gateway providers that support BTT – For merchants who wish to accept BTT as payment

2. Merchants that accept BTT – For consumers interested in buying products with BTT

3. Organizations that accept BTT donations – For consumers interested in making a positive impact

1. Payment gateway providers that support BTT

CoinPayments

CoinPayments is one of the original crypto payment gateways, enabling millions of customers around the world to use BitTorrent Token (BTT) to purchase goods and services from over 10,000 online merchants. With over 2.2 million users across 182 countries around the world, CoinPayments.net is the most comprehensive multi-cryptocurrency platform available online. Accepting over 175 cryptocurrencies, CoinPayments offers shopping cart plugins for all the major ecommerce platforms, a variety of payment buttons that can be seamlessly added into any website or application, integration APIs, and invoice building and point of sale tools.

Plisio

Plisio enables small companies, mid-market businesses, and large enterprises to accept BTT. Plisio is a leading cryptocurrency payment gateway that enables easy payment fulfillment across a growing list of cryptocurrencies, including BTC, ETH, XMR, ZEC, LTC, DASH, TUSD, USDT, BTT and others. 

Through the use of shopping plugins, Plisio helps businesses using existing ecommerce platforms like WooCommerce, Magento, OpenCart, BigCommerce, X-Cart and others, to add BTT as a payment option.

With the help of white label solutions, merchants have a full range of personalization options and control, including the ability to use their own design and logo for invoices. Plisio also allows for a more seamless sales process, since customers aren’t redirected to other websites during checkout.

CoinGate

CoinGate offers cryptocurrency payment processing services to online merchants. Its payment gateway offers cryptocurrency payment processing services for B2B clients, allowing businesses to set up a full cryptocurrency payments infrastructure, track orders and manage cryptocurrency earnings across almost 100 supported currencies, including BitTorrent Token (BTT). Merchants that use the CoinGate platform include flight and hotel booking sites, VPNs, VPS, games, dating, domain registration services, online advertising networks and more. 

2. Merchants that accept BTT

BitTorrent

BitTorrent is behind the largest decentralized P2P communications protocol for distributing data and large files over the Internet. It offers popular torrent clients for Windows, Mac, and Android and sells several premium products for Windows that can be purchased using BTT. Classic Pro is the most popular, which includes malware and virus protection, no ads, an HD media player, file converter, and premium customer support. To purchase Pro for BitTorrent Web or to purchase BitTorrent Classic, follow the ‘Buy in crypto’ links on any product or download page and follow the easy checkout process.

NordVPN

Serving over 14 million users worldwide, NordVPN is one of the most trusted internet security providers in the world, with both PCMag.com and Techradar.com naming NordVPN the best VPN provider for its deep set of pro-privacy features. NordVPN features thousands of servers, helping drive fast download speeds, smooth streaming, and uninterrupted online gaming. With a no-logs policy that was reviewed by PricewaterhouseCoopers, NordVPN doesn’t collect data that can be stored or shared.

With apps for Windows, macOS, Linux, Android, iOS, Chrome, Firefox and Edge, users can connect to NordVPN servers with just a few clicks. To purchase NordVPN using BTT, select a plan, then select Crypto Currencies on the checkout page.

Windscribe VPN

Windscribe is a virtual private network provider that has VPN servers in over 110 cities in 62 countries and supports 6 different VPN protocols. Users can run Windscribe on any device, including Windows and Mac computers, Linux,  iOS, Android, TV boxes, Chrome and Firefox browsers, FireTV, Huawei devices, and most routers. Windscribe’s browser extensions enable you to enhance your level of privacy with features like geo-location API spoofing, time zone spoofing, ad blocking, tracking cookie removal and more. This helps prevent hackers from stealing your data while you use public Wi-Fi, and blocks advertisers from tracking you online. To purchase Windscribe VPN using BTT, select a plan, then select Crypto Currencies on the checkout page.

µTorrent

µTorrent offers free torrent client software for Windows, Mac, and Android and sells several premium products that can be purchased using BTT. Classic Pro is the most popular, which includes malware and virus protection, no ads, an HD media player, file converter, and premium customer support. To purchase Pro for µTorrent Web or to purchase µTorrent Classic, follow the ‘Buy in crypto’ links on any product or download page and follow the easy checkout process.

NordPass

NordPass is a password manager that allows you to securely store and remember passwords for all your favorite websites and accounts. When logging into a new website or account, NordPass will prompt you to save your password and then offer to fill it in when you revisit the site. NordPass can generate unique passwords or use your existing ones, and you can access them on any device or browser at any time. With the use of a master password or use of multi-factor authentication, NordPass protects your data using XChaCha20 encryption. It also syncs your passwords across multiple platforms, so you can access them on desktop, mobile, or any browser. 

In addition to securely storing your passwords, NordPass can also help you fill forms with your personal information and credit cards. In the event you need to share your passwords or information, you can do so securely to those you trust, and even provide access to all your passwords in case of emergency. Available for personal or business use, NordPass starts at just $2.99. To purchase NordPass using BTT, select a plan, then select Crypto Currencies on the checkout page.

ControlD

ControlD is an easy to use, completely customizable DNS service that adds layers of privacy and security that traditional VPN services are unable to provide. With no installation required, Control D blocks ads and tracking, and changes users’ location (IP address). By putting you in control over what content is accessible on devices in your household, Control D increases productivity and security.

While being effective at blocking ads and ad tracking, Control D can also help productivity by blocking access to websites or services during specific times of the day. It can also protect the household from harmful content by restricting access to certain categories of sites and services. With the Default Location feature, Control D can change your IP address from the perspective of web sites and apps, making it appear as if you are in a different country. 

To purchase Control D using BTT, select a plan, then select Crypto Currencies on the checkout page. 

Ivacy VPN

Ivacy offers VPN services that help provide a secure connection route for your internet traffic while you browse the web. Ivacy replaces your IP address with one from Ivacy’s secure servers, helping prevent hackers, surveillance agencies and ISPs from monitoring your online activities. With a network of over 5700 servers in 100 locations, Ivacy VPN helps safeguard your privacy across multiple platforms, including Windows, Mac, Android, iOS, Linux, Xbox, Raspberry Pi, Kodi, and Roku. Extensions for Chrome, Firefox and Edge browsers are also available to make it easy to connect to VPN from within your favorite web browser.

To purchase Ivacy VPN using BTT, select a plan, then select CoinGate from the payment methods on the checkout page. 

CactusVPN

CactusVPN allows you to secure your data on Wi-Fi networks, prevent ISP or government surveillance, avoid bandwidth throttling, and keep your online activity private. With high-speed servers in 22 countries, CactusVPN offers unlimited bandwidth and stable connection speeds.

To purchase CactusVPN using BTT, select a plan, then select Cryptocurrency on the checkout page.  

3. Organizations that accept BTT donations

Offsetra

Offsetra allows anyone to offset their carbon generating activity, including blockchain, by supporting high-quality carbon reduction initiatives. What’s an offset? A carbon offset unit represents the removal of one tonne of carbon dioxide equivalent (t CO2e) from the atmosphere or the avoidance of one tonne of emissions. Offset units are generated and sold by projects that deliver measurable reductions in greenhouse gas emissions.

Offsetra sources all of its credits from verified projects listed on the APX carbon registry. These include certified credits from renewable energy, reforestation initiatives, and methane capture. By offsetting your emissions through Offsetra, you are helping humanity move toward a carbon neutral and environmentally friendly future.
